java._comment: Only classes with javax.ws.rs annotations are included since we want to check only REST API.

filter._comment: We don't want to check transitive classes, e.g. from package org.kie.server.controller.api, since we already check them in their own module.

revapi._comment: Changes between 7.5.0.Final and the current branch. These changes are desired and thus ignored.

ignore.annotation: @io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation(value = "Connect a new Kie Server instance to Controller", response = org.kie.server.controller.api.model.KieServerSetup.class)
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Remove a Kie Server instance from Controller")
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Remove Container Specification from a given Server Template")

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Container Specification or Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation(value = "Get Container Specification for a given id and Server Template", response = org.kie.server.controller.api.model.spec.ContainerSpec.class)

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Container Specification or Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation(value = "Retrieve Server Template for a given id", response = org.kie.server.controller.api.model.spec.ServerTemplate.class)

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation(value = "Retrieve all Container Specification for a Server Template", response = org.kie.server.controller.api.model.spec.ContainerSpecList.class)

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Add new Container Specification to a given Server Template")

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Start Container for a given id and Server Template")

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Container or Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Stop Container for a given id and Server Template")

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Container or Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})

ignore.annotation: @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Container Specification or Server Template not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})
@io.swagger.annotations.ApiOperation("Update Container Specification in a given Server Template")

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponses({@io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 404, message = "Server Template or Container not found"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 400, message = "Controller exception"), @io.swagger.annotations.ApiResponse(code = 500, message = "Unexpected error")})

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiParam(name = "Kie Server instance information", required = true, examples = @io.swagger.annotations.Example({@io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/json", value = "{
  "id" : "sample-server",
  "version" : "7.14.0-SNAPSHOT",
  "name" : "sample-server",
  "location" : "http://localhost:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server",
  "capabilities" : [
       "KieServer",       "BRM",       "BPM",       "CaseMgmt",       "BPM-UI",       "BRP",       "DMN",       "Swagger"    ],
  "messages" : null
}"), @io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/xml", value = "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<kie-server-info>
  <id>sample-server</id>
  <version>7.14.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  <name>sample-server</name>
  <location>http://localhost:8080/kie-server/services/rest/server</location>
  <capabilities>KieServer</capabilities>
  <capabilities>BRM</capabilities>
  <capabilities>BPM</capabilities>
  <capabilities>CaseMgmt</capabilities>
  <capabilities>BPM-UI</capabilities>
  <capabilities>BRP</capabilities>
  <capabilities>DMN</capabilities>
  <capabilities>Swagger</capabilities>
</kie-server-info>")}))

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiParam(name = "Container information", required = true, examples = @io.swagger.annotations.Example({@io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/json", value = "{
  "container-id" : "evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT",
  "container-name" : "evaluation",
  "release-id" : {
       "group-id" : "evaluation",
        "artifact-id" : "evaluation",
        "version" : "1.0.0-SNAPSHOT"
    },
  "configuration" : null,
  "status" : "STARTED"
}"), @io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/xml", value = "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<container-spec-details>
    <container-id>evaluation_1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</container-id>
    <container-name>evaluation</container-name>
    <release-id>
        <artifact-id>evaluation</artifact-id>
        <group-id>evaluation</group-id>
        <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    </release-id>
    <status>STARTED</status>
</container-spec-details>")}))

@io.swagger.annotations.ApiParam(name = "Kie Server Template information", required = true, examples = @io.swagger.annotations.Example({@io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/json", value = "{
  "server-id" : "sample-server",
  "server-name" : "sample-server",
  "capabilities" : [
       "RULE",       "PROCESS",       "PLANNING"    ],
  "container-specs" : [ ],
  "server-config" : { }
}"), @io.swagger.annotations.ExampleProperty(mediaType = "application/xml", value = "<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<server-template-details>
  <server-id>sample-server</server-id>
  <server-name>sample-server</server-name>
  <configs/>
  <capabilities>RULE</capabilities>
  <capabilities>PROCESS</capabilities>
  <capabilities>PLANNING</capabilities>
</server-template-details>")}))
